source.query: SELECT CAST('ApiDB' as VARCHAR2(47)) as PROJECT_ID, CAST(enas.SOURCE_ID as VARCHAR2(255)) as SOURCE_ID, enas.A_COUNT, enas.C_COUNT, enas.G_COUNT, enas.T_COUNT, enas.OTHER_COUNT, enas.LENGTH, CAST('Ncbi dbEST' as VARCHAR2(120)) as DBEST_NAME, CAST('Other Apicomplexan (no Cmp,Pbfvy,Tg)' as VARCHAR2(40)) as ORGANISM, CAST(5794 as NUMBER(10)) as NCBI_TAX_ID, CAST('Other Apicomplexan ESTs' as VARCHAR2(80)) as EXTERNAL_DB_NAME, CAST(9999 as NUMBER(5)) as LIBRARY_IDx FROM dots.ExternalNASequence enas WHERE enas.taxon_id = '88165'
